title: Save Afghan Christians | Guests: Rudy Atallah & Ken Cuccinelli | 8/18/21
description:
Glenn gives a passionate monologue encompassing the fear of many citizens in Afghanistan. COO of the Nazarene Fund Rudy Atallah shares the uphill battle the fund faces to save Christian Afghanistan citizens. Glenn asks his viewers to donate to help rescue Afghanistan Christians who are in danger of being persecuted. Former Virginia Attorney General Ken Cuccinelli joins to discuss the border and his election transparency campaign. Glenn reads “Live Not by Lies” by Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn. Stu gives a mini-rant on CNN's Chris Cuomo discussing his brother's sexual assault scandal.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
